a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Drug overdose death rates, United States, 1999 to 2020
Death rates from drug overdoses in the United States, measured as the number of deaths per 100,000 individuals.
Data source: US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention WONDER
Note: Opioids include prescription pain-relief drugs; synthetic opioids, excluding methadone; and other opioids, such as heroin.
